about.title: About
about.paragraph: I'm a Data and Systems Engineering student with <1>Extremaduran roots — curious, passionate, and with a conquering spirit</1>. I love building projects from scratch, turning ideas into reality, and learning something new at every step of the process. I’m deeply interested in <1>cloud computing</1> and its connection with <1>big data</1>, as well as an ever-growing fascination with <1>artificial intelligence</1> and <1>machine learning</1>. My goal is to <1>create projects that make a positive impact</1> and, in the future, to <1>build my own ventures</1>, taking my ideas as far as my ambition allows.
